com.shinobicontrols.chart
Class Chart

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          com.shinobicontrols.chart.Chart
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, CrosshairMovableEvent.Handler, Event.Handler, SettingsChangedEvent.Handler, Mutable.ChangedEvent.Handler, Styleable
public class Chart
extends android.view.ViewGroup
implements SettingsChangedEvent.Handler, CrosshairMovableEvent.Handler, Styleable

A Chart is the root View for displaying a chart. A chart has a Chart.Settings object to control its display. It can contain many Series objects that control how data is displayed and up to 4 Axis objects. The Series, PlotArea, Axis and Legend are all retrieved from the Chart.
